apple_vendor_description: Apple’s depiction of this kiss emoji features a woman with a dark skin tone sharing a tender moment with another person, whose skin tone is not specified, creating a versatile and inclusive representation. The emoji gleams with Apple’s signature glossy 3D shading and soft, rounded edges, emphasizing the intimacy of the gesture. This rendering on Apple devices beautifully conveys affection, romance, and connection, allowing for diverse expressions of love in digital communication.
